title: Blistered Snap Peas with Mint
directions: Preheat the oven to 500Â°. Set a large, ovenproof skillet over high heat until very hot, about 2 minutes. Add the pure olive oil and swirl to coat the pan. Add the snap peas, toss a few times and transfer the skillet to the oven. Cook for 2 minutes, then carefully toss the peas a few times. Return the skillet to the oven and cook for 2 minutes longer, until the peas are crisp-tender. Toss the peas with the lemon oil and season with salt. Transfer to a serving bowl. Scatter the mint on top and serve.
ingredients: 2 pounds sugar snap peas, ends trimmed and strings discarded
Flaky sea salt, such as Maldon
